subject: Add PWA debug banner for mobile diagnostics
body:
Temporary debug component that shows on-screen diagnostics for PWA
install issues on mobile web. Checks: SW registration, manifest validity,
OneSignal CDN reachability, beforeinstallprompt status, and more.
Tap "PWA Debug" pill in bottom-right to expand, "Copy" to grab logs.

https://claude.ai/code/session_019aJVwko6MdY3Af5s5kz4Sa
title: Add PWA debug banner for mobile diagnostics
